content: [EDIT]5/1/2023Hexhash.xyz Bounty Campaign will be extended for 1 - week.Discussions about an additional bounty pool are yet to be determined. The team will decide soon whether they'll add more tokens or not.A follow-up announcement will be added to this post as soon as I have their decision.[EDIT]5/4/2023No additional bounty pool will be added.[EDIT]5/11/2023HexHash Bounty Campaign has officially ended.The main spreadsheet will be finalized and bounty rewards will be distributed within 1 to 2 weeks after this bounty campaign has ended. Estimated date: 5/22[EDIT]5/21/2023HexHash Bounty rewards have been distributed: https://bscscan.com/tx/0xb415132160480b39a6e058470f36de3e47accf1dde84ec9af9ef81cf25f7f13a[ AVATAR ]https://imgur.com/NI7HaUn[ PERSONAL TEXT ]Code:Hexhash.xyz[ SIGNATURE CODES ][ SR.
